column2: "Somehow... it looks like... everyone made it... out okay?"
"Sara, you shouldn't be out of breath over something as little as that. It's pathetic. You lack training."
"Shut up, stupid Maria! You should understand that you're not one to be compared with!"
"More than that, are you sure it was okay to use the Labrys?"
"What, you were worried about me?"
"Not at all. I was wondering about your Genesis."
"...It's no good. I guess I'll have to bow my head to Zeig for the first time in ten years."
"...<%me>, sorry about that. Thanks for coming to get me."
"After acting cool and telling you to head back first, I can't believe how lame I look right now."
"Fighting [Elder] by yourself and coming out alive is in and of itself a miracle."
"Zeno-boy, you really have resistance to bad luck."
"Please don't use that nickname."
"Casra was with me at first, but we got split up. I'm sure that he managed to get out okay."
"You were with Casra? Which means this news will be passed along to Luther."
"If they think that Zeno-boy died, then this might be a good chance for us."
"Looks like we might have scooped up something unexpected. No, this is likely what we were after."
"The fact that you're here means that Echo and that girl made it out okay. I'm relieved knowing that much."
"[Elder] wasn't ordinary. And to think that he wasn't even using a fraction of what he's capable of."
"If that's the case, then I'm completely worthless. I can't protect anyone the way I am right now."
"That's natural for a Hunter who treats his class like a hobby."
"But even so, I like naive people who are able to see things to the end."
"That's why, Zeno-boy, I'll retrain you. So that you can protect those who you want to protect."
"You'd really do that for me?"
"Of course I will. Plus, I wasn't able to finish off [Elder], so I feel it's my duty."
"Sara, is that okay with Xiao?"
"That was my plan from the beginning. Thanks for saving me the trouble, he says."
"Unlike Sara.... hey Xiao! Do you always have to go out of your way to break my balls?"
"<%me>, thank you."
"There's one more thing I'd like to trouble you for."
"Please don't tell Echo that I'm okay."
"I think that would be a good wake up call for her."
"Don't worry, I'm going to get stronger and come back."
"So until then, please take care of her."
"She's doing okay? You say that like you already know what's going to happen."
"I won't forget this. I'll definitely come back and repay you one day. So take care of yourself until then."
"A Step Toward The Future"
"第８章 終わりの始まり"
